Container.Name: NexusOSS
Container.Overview:
Nexus Repository OSS
First run may take some time while DB is provisioned.
Initial admin password is stored in nexus-data/admin.password The default path for this is /mnt/user/appdata/nexus-data/admin.password
To add a hosted Docker Registry, see Nexus Documentation or the README here https://github.com/jslay88/unraid_apps/blob/master/templates/README/NexusOSS.md

Config.Name: Docker Registry
Config.Description:
Port for Docker Registry (if any), usually 5000
See README for setup.
